Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: lockArray()
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Locks the array for writes. Must be unlocked by unlockArray()

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: unlockArray()
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Unlocks the array after it has been locked by lockArray()

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: first(where:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns the first element of the sequence that satisfies the given predicate or nil if no such element is found.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: filter(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns an array containing, in order, the elements of the sequence that satisfy the given predicate.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: index(where:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns the first index in which an element of the collection satisfies the given predicate.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: sorted(by:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns the elements of the collection, sorted using the given predicate as the comparison between elements.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: flatMap(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns an array containing the non-nil results of calling the given transformation with each element of this sequence.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: forEach(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Calls the given closure on each element in the sequence in the same order as a for-in loop.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: contains(where:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the sequence contains an element that satisfies the given predicate.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: append(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Adds a new element at the end of the array.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: append(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Adds a new element at the end of the array.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: insert(_:at:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Inserts a new element at the specified position.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: remove(at:completion:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Removes and returns the element at the specified position.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: remove(where:completion:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Removes and returns the element at the specified position.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: removeAll(completion:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Removes all elements from the array.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Accesses the element at the specified position if it exists.

Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.name: contains(_:)
Classes/WriteLockableSynchronizedArray.h.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the sequence contains the given element.
